title: NBA Finals Game 1 Reaction
description:
Brian Windhorst and Zach Lowe discuss the Suns winning Game 1, Chris Paul’s brilliance, the importance of free throw shooting, what adjustments the Bucks can make and Deandre Ayton stepping up.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Joint Hoop Collective And Lowe Post Reaction To NBA Finals Game 1
